feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: National Symposium on the Future of Drugs

link.title: National Symposium on the Future of Drugs

entry.content: On behalf of the NSF, we are organizing the National Symposium on Drug Repurposing for Future Pandemics. We have a stellar lineup of invited speakers! Register at www.drugsymposium.org.
entry.summary: On behalf of the NSF, we are organizing the National Symposium on Drug Repurposing for Future Pandemics. We have a stellar lineup of invited speakers! Register at www.drugsymposium.org.

entry.title: MARS: Novel Cell Types in Single-cell Datasets

link.title: MARS: Novel Cell Types in Single-cell Datasets

entry.content: Hot off the press! MARS, an approach for discovering novel cell types across heterogeneous single-cell experiments is just published in Nature Methods.
entry.summary: Hot off the press! MARS, an approach for discovering novel cell types across heterogeneous single-cell experiments is just published in Nature Methods.

entry.title: Four Papers Accepted at NeurIPS
entry.content: Thrilled that our lab has 4 papers accepted at NeurIPS 2020! Congratulations to fantastic students and collaborators, Michelle, Xiang, Kexin, Sam, and Emily.
entry.summary: Thrilled that our lab has 4 papers accepted at NeurIPS 2020! Congratulations to fantastic students and collaborators, Michelle, Xiang, Kexin, Sam, and Emily.

entry.title: MITxHarvard Women in AI Interview
entry.content: The MITxHarvard Women in AI initiative talked with Marinka about AI, machine learning, and the role of new technologies in biomedical research.
entry.summary: The MITxHarvard Women in AI initiative talked with Marinka about AI, machine learning, and the role of new technologies in biomedical research.

entry.title: Trustworthy AI for Healthcare
entry.content: We are excited to be co-organizing a workshop at AAAI 2021 on Trustworthy AI for Healthcare! We have a stellar lineup of speakers. Details to follow soon!
entry.summary: We are excited to be co-organizing a workshop at AAAI 2021 on Trustworthy AI for Healthcare! We have a stellar lineup of speakers. Details to follow soon!

entry.title: Network Drugs for COVID-19
entry.content: What are network drugs? Drugs for COVID-19 predicted by network medicine, our graph neural networks (GNNs), and our rank aggregation algorithms, followed by experimental confirmations. The full paper is finally out!
entry.summary: What are network drugs? Drugs for COVID-19 predicted by network medicine, our graph neural networks (GNNs), and our rank aggregation algorithms, followed by experimental confirmations. The full paper is finally out!

entry.title: Podcast on ML for Drug Development

link.title: Podcast on ML for Drug Development

entry.content: Tune in to the podcast with Marinka about machine learning to drug development. The discussion focuses on open research questions in the field, including how to limit the search space of high-throughput screens, design drugs entirely from scratch, and identify likely side-effects of combining drugs in novel ways.
entry.summary: Tune in to the podcast with Marinka about machine learning to drug development. The discussion focuses on open research questions in the field, including how to limit the search space of high-throughput screens, design drugs entirely from scratch, and identify likely side-effects of combining drugs in novel ways.

entry.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellowship
entry.content: We have a new opening for a postdoctoral research fellow in novel machine learning methods to combat COVID-19! Submit your application by September 1, 2020.
entry.summary: We have a new opening for a postdoctoral research fellow in novel machine learning methods to combat COVID-19! Submit your application by September 1, 2020.

entry.title: DeepPurpose Library
entry.content: DeepPurpose is a deep learning library for drug-target interaction prediction and applications to drug repurposing and virtual screening.
entry.summary: DeepPurpose is a deep learning library for drug-target interaction prediction and applications to drug repurposing and virtual screening.

entry.title: Subgraph Neural Networks
entry.content: Subgraph neural networks learn powerful subgraph representations that create fundamentally new opportunities for predictions beyond nodes, edges, and entire graphs.
entry.summary: Subgraph neural networks learn powerful subgraph representations that create fundamentally new opportunities for predictions beyond nodes, edges, and entire graphs.
